response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that holds significant value to both of us. Given its unique attributes and the benefits it offers, I believe it is worth more than $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am extending an offer to purchase the product from me at a price of $1,400,000. This represents a fair valuation that respects the product's worth while also allowing you to secure a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.", "product_price": 1400000}
